Features.Name: Core.HoppingAmplitude.Construction.1
Features.Verify: Request for amplitude callback exits or throw exception.

Features.Name: Core.HoppingAmplitude.Construction.2
Features.Do: Create HoppingAmplitude with amplitude and to- and from-Indices, and request the amplitude and to- and from-Indices.
Features.Verify: The amplitude and to- and from-Indices are equal to the values used to construct the HoppingAmplitude.

Features.Name: Core.HoppingAmplitude.Construction.3
Features.Do: Create HoppingAmplitude with amplitude callback and to- and from-Indices, and request the amplitude and to- and from-Indices.
Features.Verify: The amplitude is correctly returned from the amplitude callback and the to- and from-Indices are equal to the Indices used to construct the HoppingAmplitude.

Features.Name: Core.HoppingAmplitude.Copy.1
Features.Do: Create a HoppingAmplitude with a value as amplitude and copy the HoppingAmplitude.
Features.Verify: The amplitude and to- and from-Indices agree for the two HoppingAmplitudes.

Features.Name: Core.HoppingAmplitude.Copy.2
Features.Do: Create a HoppingAmplitude with a callback function as amplitude and copy the HoppingAmplitude.
Features.Verify: The amplitude and to- and from-Indices agree for the two HoppingAmplitudes.

Features.Name: Core.HoppingAmplitude.Serialization.1
Features.Do: Create a HoppingAmplitude with a value as amplitude. Serialize it and create a new HoppingAmplitude from the serialization.
Features.Verify: The amplitude and to- and from-Indices agree for the two HoppingAmplitudes.

Features.Name: Core.HoppingAmplitude.getHermitianConjugate.1
Features.Do: Create a HoppingAmplitude with a value as amplitude and create a new HoppingAmplitude by calling hoppingAmplitude.getHermitianConjugate().
Features.Verify: The amplitude is the complex conjugate of the original amplitude and the to- and from-Indices are interchanged.

Features.Name: Core.HoppingAmplitude.getHermitianConjugate.2
Features.Do: Create a HoppingAmplitude with a callback function as amplitude and create a new HoppingAmplitude by calling hoppingAmplitude.getHermitianConjugate().
Features.Verify: The amplitude is the complex conjugate of the amplitude of the original HoppingAmplitude and the to- and from-Indices are interchanged.

Features.Name: Core.HoppingAmplitude.getAmplitude.1
Features.Do: Create a HoppingAmplitude with a value as amplitude and call hoppingAmplitude.getAmplitude().
Features.Verify: The returned amplitude is equal to that used to construct the HoppingAmplitude.

Features.Name: Core.HoppingAmplitude.getAmplitude.2
Features.Do: Create a HoppingAmplitude with a callback function as amplitude and call hoppingAmplitude.getAmplitude().
Features.Verify: The returned amplitude is equal to what is expected to be returned from the callback function.

Features.Name: Core.HoppingAmplitude.operatorAddition.1.C++
Features.Do: Create a HoppingAmplitude pair by adding a HoppingAmplitude with HC.
Features.Verify: The pair contains the HoppingAmplitude and it's Hermitian conjugate.
